recentPrompt:
This project focuses on using loops in C. Create a program that takes an integer as input from the user, representing the number of times to print "Hello, world!".  The program should then use a `for` loop to print the message that many times. This improves your understanding of iterative control flow.

To use this project, declare an integer variable. Use `scanf` to get user input. Then, use a `for` loop to iterate the specified number of times, printing "Hello, world!" in each iteration using `printf`.

Example usage:

Enter the number of times to print: 5
Hello, world!
Hello, world!
Hello, world!
Hello, world!
Hello, world!
